PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-07212023-07-06PMO
ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of JUDE PIERRE SAMSON, full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal for the Appeal Division, for the period he is acting as Vice-Chairperson, effective January 28, 2023, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Vice-Chairperson.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Department of Employment and Social Development Act
precis: Order fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of JUDE PIERRE SAMSON, full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal for the Appeal Division, for the period he is acting as  Vice-Chairperson, effective January 28, 2023, until such time as he is no longer required to act as Vice-Chairperson.
